message:
Not mine, but for all the math nerds out there: "I wish I was your derivative so I could lie tangent to your curves." 

*snort*
@cym0n LOL, I've got that stickered on my laptop!

After reading about @schrodingercat's odd pickup this morning, I thought this needed further discussion and brainstorming. Here's the original offending pickup line:

"I'm walking along the park, tweeting. Some guy steps in front of me, says: 'The best part is, I'm right here so you don't have to text me!'"

So now's the time to flex your creative muscles! Get to it! :P
"Talk nerdy to me"...that is all I got
I've always thought of pickup lines as being jokes more than something people actually use.
@blogkitten I need to use that on HM. Since he's finishing his PhD in math, I think he'd be pretty amused by that.
I remembered one of my favorites: How much does a polar bear weigh? Enough to break the ice!
I was told  "Linux/BSD hybrid kernel" is a great pickup line, but I'm not sure if she was being totally sarcastic...
